data.comment: The match has started at Gelredome.
Abdou Harroui (Sparta) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 20, Michael Heylen (Sparta) has received a first yellow card.
Oussama Tannane scores to make it 1-0 at Gelredome.
He's off! Michael Heylen is shown a second yellow card.
In the minute 44, Thomas Bruns is booked for the home team.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
The second-half has started.
In the minute 52, Tomas Hajek for Vitesse has been booked by Bjorn Kuipers and receives a first yellow card.
Mica Pinto (Sparta) gets a yellow card.
The away team have replaced Lennart Thy with Emanuel Emegha. This is the fourth substitution made today by Henk Fraser.
In the minute 66, Armando Broja is replacing Oussama Darfalou for Vitesse at Gelredome.
Henk Fraser is making the team's first substitution at Gelredome with Sven Mijnans replacing Bryan Smeets.
Henk Fraser (Sparta) is making a second substitution, with Aaron Meijers replacing Abdou Harroui.
In the minute 82, Great finish from Armando Broja to give Vitesse a 2-0 lead.
Oussama Tannane with an assist there.
Idrissa Toure is replacing Thomas Bruns for the home team.
In the minute 89, The away team have replaced Adil Auassar with Sven Mijnans. This is the third substitution made today by Henk Fraser.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 2-0.
Thomas Letsch (Vitesse) is making a third substitution, with Daan Huisman replacing Lois Openda.
